Game Details

{{ game.name }}

{{ game.description }}

Publish Date: {{ game.publishDate }}

Genres: {{ game.genreNames.join(', ') }}

Publisher: {{ game.publisherName }}

Price: {{ game.price }}

Loading game details...

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Game } from '../models/game.model'; import { GameService } from '../game/game.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-game-details', templateUrl: './game-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./game-details.component.css'] }) export class GameDetailsComponent implements OnInit { game: Game | undefined; isStoreComponent = false; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private gameService: GameService ) {} ngOnInit() { this.isStoreComponent = this.route.snapshot.data['isStoreComponent']; this.getGameDetails(); } getGameDetails() { const gameId = +this.route.snapshot.params['id']; // Use the '+' operator to convert the ID to a number console.log('Game ID:', gameId); // Print the game ID to the console if (this.isStoreComponent) { // Request for the store component this.gameService.getGameById(gameId).subscribe({ next: (game: Game) => { this.game = game; }, error: (error) => { console.error(error); } }); } else { // Request for the library component this.gameService.getPurchasedGameById(gameId).subscribe({ next: (game: Game) => { this.game = game; }, error: (error) => { console.error(error); } }); } } }
